channel.title: Bleeding doesn't shows a mark, mvp always 1,2,3
channel.description:
I was bleeding, I got the message but no mark on my character.
Also, mvp are always 1,2,3

item.title: Bleeding doesn't shows a mark, mvp always 1,2,3
item.dc:creator: Superkran
item.description:
I’ve said it in discord but i’ll say it again here, that if you are bleeding and your death is delayed at the same time, you have 2 icons but their interaction is glitched. You mouse over any of those and they start switching super fast.

Read full topic
item.source: Bleeding doesn't shows a mark, mvp always 1,2,3

cheers

item.title: Bleeding doesn't shows a mark, mvp always 1,2,3
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The bleeding icon has been moved to the right of the screen.
~artist impression
The MVP thing is a known bug and will be fixed in the next patch.
